home.cryptoquantumblurb: Heavily armored and ready to defend your Identity, important assets and intellectual properties at all cost. This is what defines us. We are protecting tomorrow, today.
home.section1-brand: With a database containing over 7 million brands & trademarks, you probably are already protected by AKX without knowing it. Nobody can use your brand name but yourself. All you will have to do is claim it and start adding your precious assets to protect.
home.section1-id: AKX ID began as an on-chain user identity solution to protect user information and content. It then evolved into a full fledged asset management & security product driven by state-of-the-art quantum and post quantum algorithms.
home.section1-auth: If you own or plan to develop a new brand, especially in the luxury products market, you want to make sure your products are not cloned or tempered. Every year billions of dollars are lost because of counterfeit brand items. AKX ID is offering a simple yet efficient solution to counter that problem.
